vsParam:
Done... It's done!
We made it, guys!!

[px]! You made it.
Now we can challenge the dragon!

Yup. Finally... Finally it's time.
Hehe, I can't wait!

It's not the time to say this... But I just can't help but
get excited with the impending battle.

Oh! I'm so excited, ahhh!
Guys, we're so going to take down that dragon!!
Haha, Cresson, what we need now is exactly your passion!

Hey, don't spoil the mood!
Try to learn from Cresson a bit!

Victory is just around the corner with that!
The dragon isn't horrible at all!
Speaking of which... how will this weapon work?

Hey! You didn't even know how it's going to work
before you made it!?

N-not like that. Yeah, I didn't know.
But [px] and Anise should know it!

Oh my god, you stupid fairy...
Anise, please explain it!
Hey, Sorel, you don't know it either!?

Haha... We could do great damage to the dragon
as long as we're equipped with this weapon.

Yeah. OK, now you know its characteristics... Let's start
our dragon killing journey! Oh, you take the weapon, [px].

The dragon is in Ateria.
Get ready to set off!
